item.title: ISRO-made system to alert users at unmanned level crossings
item.author: PTI
item.description: Satellite-based chip systems will now alert road users at unmanned level crossings about approaching trains and also help in tracking train movement on a real-time basis.On a pilot basis, the Mumbai a...

item.title: With Facebook banned, Kashmir’s youth reach out via Kashbook
item.author: Suvojit Bagchi
item.description: Tech-savvy teens develop alternative social networking platforms for the Valley

item.title: Google to stop reading your Gmail to sell targeted ads
item.author: AP
item.description: Google still plans to show ads within Gmail. But instead of scanning through email content, the company’s software will rely on other signals.
